gui_View_Coord
=====================

   :scale: 50%

   <Selected: Num 1>

   <Selected: Num 2>

   <Selected: Num 4>

Case_2
---------------------

.. figure:: /images/4_Example/View_Coord_remove_duplicates_1.png
   :scale: 100%

   <Before clicking the "Remove Duplicates" button>

.. figure:: /images/4_Example/View_Coord_remove_duplicates_2.png
   :scale: 100%

   <After clicking the "Remove Duplicates" button>

Take a look at Num 4 & 5, and Num 1 & 6.  
Num 4 and 5 have the exact same coordinates and bounding box â€” so one of them is unnecessary.  
Same goes for Num 1 and 6.  
The "Remove Duplicates" feature helps clean these up automatically.
